data.title: Gauhati University, Guwahati

data.text:
The Gauhati University-College of Engineering is established in the year of 1948 by an act of the State Legislature (the Gauhati University Act 1947 (Assam Act, XVI of 1947) of the Government of Assam). It is approved by UGC (University Grants Commission) and the Government of Assam. The Gauhati University is also accredited by NAAC. The University offers AICTE approved management and engineering courses. All the law courses offered by this university are approved by BCI (Bar Council of India).

Campus

The Gauhati University-College of Engineering is located in Jalukbari in the Guwahati city. The nearest airport is Lokpriya Gopinath Bordoloi International Airport is just 10 Km away from the university and the nearest railway station (Guwahati Railway Station) is 10 Km away from the university.

Facilities

The Gauhati University-College of Engineering provides all the major facilities to their students such as spacious and well-ventilated classrooms, library (equipped with 850,000 books, magazines and journals), hostel facility, bank facility, transport facility, computer centre, internet facility, department wise laboratory, sports facility (indoor and outdoor games), well-maintained canteen and many more.

Programmes

The Gauhati University-College of Engineering provides many UG (under-graduate) and PG (postgraduate) in the field of engineering. University Law College is a constituent unit of Gauhati University which offers PG and Doctoral courses in the law field. Here is the list of some courses provided by Gauhati University:

Engineering Programme

B.Tech Courses:

Electronics and Communication Technology

M.Tech Courses:

Signal Processing and Communication

Signal Processing and VLSI

Ph.D Courses:

Electronics and Communication Technology

Management Programme

MBA Courses:

MBA in Business Administration

Dual MBA in Business Administration

MBE in Business Economins

Executive MBA in Business Administration

Diploma Courses:

Human Resource (HR)

Finance

Marketing

Insurance

Ph.D Courses:

Human Resource

Marketing

Finance

Law Courses:

LL.M (Master of Laws)

Ph.D in LL.M

Placement

The training and placement cell helps students regarding their placements. The TP Cell also conduct lectures, personality development programs, soft skills programs, pre-placement talks, group discussion and many more. Many students of this university got placed in various companies like Wipro, ICICI Bank, NIIT, Versine Technologies, Xcome Technology, Maverik Systems and many more.
